column1: A day at the beach.  When @entity3 woke in the morning, he was super excited!  Today was theday!  It was Sunday, the day that @entity3's mom and dad had promised to take @entity3 to the beach.@entity3's grandma had given a pail and shovel to @entity3 to use in the sand.  At breakfast @entity3 wasso excited he was wiggling in his seat!  @entity5 told @entity3 that they would leave when the bighand on the clock was pointing to the @entity4, and the little had was pointing to the @entity1.  @entity5asked @entity3 if he would like to help make sandwiches for the trip, and @entity3 said that hewanted to help.  @entity0 said, "let's make a game of it, we need to make a sandwich for eachof us.  There are three of us, so we need three sandwiches.  Let's count as we make thesandwiches!"  @entity3 counted as mom made the sandwiches, one for dad, one for mom and one for@entity3.  Then mom started to make another sandwich!  "@entity5!" said @entity3, "we have threesandwiches and that makes one sandwich for each of us."  @entity3's mom laughed, "You're @entity2!"  @entity3's mom said she was being silly.
@placeholder people were going to the beach
three, @entity3 his mom and his dad.
because they were going to the beach.
